Introduction
This topic contains general information on STRs, including
definition of
service records
STRs
clinical records
personnel records
types of records included in STRs
, and
STRs considered substantially complete for records development purposes
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - General Information on Service Records
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
